```{r}
# load data
CO2 <- datasets::CO2

if (!dir.exists('CO2')){
  dir.create('CO2')
}

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
dfs <- split(CO2, CO2$Type)

for (df in dfs){
  type = unique(df$Type)
  folder = paste0('CO2/',type)
  dir.create(folder)
  write.csv2(df,file=paste0(folder,'/',type,'.csv'))
}
```
